text: allahu paranna sandarbham: maryaminre makan isa, ninakkum ninre matavinum nam nalkiya anugraham orkkuka: nan parisud'dhatmavinal ninne karuttanakki. teattilil veccum prayamaya sesavum ni janannaleatu sansariccu. nam ninakk vedavum tattvajnanavum terattum incilum pathippiccutannu. ni enre anumatiyeate kalimannukeant paksiyute rupamuntakki. pinne atiluti. enre hitattal at paksiyayi. janmana kurutanayavaneyum vellappantukaraneyum enre hitattal ni sukhappetutti; enre anumatiyeate ni maranappettavare jivitattilekk tiriccukeantuvannu. pinnit ni vyaktamaya telivukalumayi israyel makkalute atutt cennu. appeal avarile satyanisedhikal, “i telivukalellam telinna abhicaram matramane”nn tallipparayukayum ceytu. pinne avaril ninn nan ninne raksiccu
